feed.title: 孙三狗的博客
feed.subtitle: 天空才是上限，梦想总会实现

entry.title: 自我介绍
entry.content:
​Dear professors and teachers，good morning . Thank you for giving me the opportunity for this interview. My name is Sun Qianpu , 22 years old, and I come from Qiqihar. I’m a graduating college student from Tianjin University of Science and Technology, and majoring in Computer Science.

​During the four years in college, while successfully completing undergraduate studies I develop hobbies such as photography editing. In the second semester of my junior year, I learned about the field of Natural Language Processing and study independently the knowledge of artificial intelligence such as machine learning and fundamentals of NLP . I will try my best to do what I wanna do, no matter how difficult it is, no matter what the result is . If I have the opportunity, I hope I can study for a doctorate to further my study. I think I should spend my whole life studying and making my own contribution to the subject, even if only a little. Besides, I have excellent social skills. I have the confidence to handle the chores of life while maintaining high-quality postgraduate study

​Finally, I’d like to thank the teachers for giving me this precious opportunity. I hope I could have the opportunity to complete my postgraduate courses in Tsinghua University, which I have been longing for a long time
entry.summary: ​ Dear professors and teachers，good morning . Thank you for giving me the opportunity for this interview. My name is Sun Qianpu , 22 year
